thread.title: This Makeup Brand Is Acting Like A Bully On Instagram And People Are Pissed
thread.title_full: This Makeup Brand Is Acting Like A Bully On Instagram And People Are Pissed

author: Daniela Cadena
title: This Makeup Brand Is Acting Like A Bully On Instagram And People Are Pissed
text:
“It’s easy to be fearful of the wrath of the customer, or of the wrath of the influencer, especially in today’s media fetishized society. But we will stand by our products and we will stand by our customers.” ID: 10586232 6. So now, people are calling for a ZPalette boycott. View this image ›
Twitter: @mariahlleonard ID: 10585229 View this image ›
Twitter: @SsssamanthaaMUA ID: 10586265 7. And retailers carrying the brand are speaking out against ZPalette’s actions. Twitter: @MakeupGeek
 ID: 10585869 View this image ›
@boxycharm / Via Instagram: @boxycharm ID: 10586281 9. BuzzFeed has reached out to ZPalette for comment. ID: 10585231
